game.name: Crime Scene Cleaner
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 한번 갱단과 엮이게 되면 평생 갱단의 일부로 남게 됩니다. 그래도 최소한 갱단에서 보수는 넉넉하게 챙겨주죠. 당신이 오직 해야 할 일은 갱단이 벌인 지저분한 일의 뒤처리를 하는 것입니다. 하지만 일이 일인 만큼, 범죄 현장을 청소하고 경찰을 잘 따돌리며 다음 임무를 준비해야 합니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Once you get tangled with the mob, you will forever be a part of the mob. At least they pay a decent salary and all you have to do is clean up after their dirty work, but you know what you’re doing. So clean crime scenes, earn as much money as you can, and get ready for the next mission.

reviewHighlights.text: As someone who has now spent 52 hours on this game and buying this as my first game ever, I recommend it to anyone who wants to relax after a long day...
Sorry for my bad english, This game is awsome like the gamplay, the music, the story. Please keep making more of this game.
